author: Sanskar Agrawal
title: Integrating Google Maps, Places API, and Reverse Geocoding with Jetpack Compose
description: Integrating Google maps into Android apps has been somewhat of a tough nut to crack for developers. With the advent of Jetpack Compose for building native UI on Android, the Google Maps team announced a Map SDK for Compose, available here. However, it is only a piece of the puzzle.
